abstract: Inflation accelerated further in China last month, government statisticians announced on Tuesday, as rising costs for food and fuel are now sending prices up briskly across Asia.
snippet: Inflation accelerated further in China last month, government statisticians announced on Tuesday, as rising costs for food and fuel are now sending prices up briskly across Asia.
lead_paragraph: HONG KONG, Dec. 11  Inflation accelerated further in China last month, government statisticians announced on Tuesday, as rising costs for food and fuel are now sending prices up briskly across Asia.

headline.main: Rising Food and Fuel Costs Spur Inflation in China
headline.print_headline: Rising Food and Fuel Costs Spur Inflation in China
